Subskills.name: Meteor Strike
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by meteor storm.

Subskills.name: Massive Stone
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of meteor storm.

Subskills.name: Astroheated Shower
Subskills.description: Meteors constantly fall around you with a decreased frequency.

Subskills.name: Meteoric Fragmentation
Subskills.description: Meteors have a chance of exploding into smaller fragments that deal additional damage.

Subskills.name: Heat Seeking Storm
Subskills.description: Meteor storm slowly travels towards the closest enemy.

Subskills.name: Concentrated Shattering
Subskills.description: Inflicts elemental break on hit with the cost of reduced area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Rolling Meteorite
Subskills.description: Chance for meteors to roll for a short duration when landing dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Rain From Hell
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of meteor storm inflicting monsters with burning on hit.

Subskills.name: Manaburning Meteorology
Subskills.description: Increases damage according to your energy. Mana cost is increased.

Subskills.name: Colossus Destroyer
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to bosses by meteor storm.

Subskills.name: Hellflame Meteors
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to burning targets.

Subskills.name: Storm of Comets
Subskills.description: Call down a rain of colossal meteors from the sky over a greater area dealing increased damage. Meteor storm now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Back Into Orbit
Subskills.description: Summon multiple storms orbiting you. Meteor storm now has a cooldown.
